name: Hoop Knight
description:
As the Hoop Knight, you are one of the kindgom's most revered... hoop slinger? Hoopster? Whatever. Brandish the ultimate(?) weapon and defeat your foes!

Tested with Chrome and Firefox.   Please report all bugs to   https://twitter.com/lectvs 

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows -  Move
  • Spin the hoop faster to deal more damage!

Tools Used:

  • pixi.js 
  • WebAudio API
  • Paint.NET 
  • PyxelEdit 
  • sfxia
  • SFXR
  • FLStudio

Ludum Dare link:   https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hoop-knight
